ROOT_ASSET_ID.description: Identifies the root asset in a chain of derived or related assets, essential for tracing asset lineage. Null if the asset does not have a parent. For example, the fiat USD (id: 5) would be the root asset for the tokens CUSDC (id: 1623) or USDCE (id: 1728).

ROOT_ASSET_SYMBOL.description: The symbol of the root asset, facilitating recognition and correlation within asset hierarchies. Null if the asset does not have a parent. For example, the fiat USD (id: 5) would be the root asset for the tokens CUSDC (id: 1623) or USDCE (id: 1728).

ROOT_ASSET_TYPE.description: Specifies the fundamental category of the root asset, crucial for understanding the base or origin of an asset's classification. Null if the asset does not have a parent. For example, the fiat USD would be the root asset for tokens CUSDC or USDCE, and in this case, the ROOT_ASSET_TYPE would be fiat.

PRICE_USD.description: Denotes the current value / price of the asset in USD. This value is used to populate toplists and is calculated based on real-time market data.

PRICE_USD_SOURCE.description: Denotes the source we used for the USD value / price.

PRICE_USD_LAST_UPDATE_TS.description: The Unix timestamp of the last update to the USD value / price of the asset.

PRICE_CONVERSION_ASSET.description: Denotes the convesion asset ID, SYMBOL and ASSET_TYPE.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the asset entry

SYMBOL.description: Internal mapped symbol for a specific asset

ASSET_TYPE.description: The type of the asset (FIAT, BLOCKCHAIN, TOKEN, etc.)

PRICE_CONVERSION_RATE.description: Denotes the current value / price of USD in the requested quote asset.

PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE.description: Denotes the current value / price of the asset in the requested quote currency.

PRICE_CONVERSION_SOURCE.description: Denotes the source we used for the conversion asset value / price.

PRICE_CONVERSION_LAST_UPDATE_TS.description: The Unix timestamp of the last update to the conversion asset value / price.

CIRCULATING_MKT_CAP_USD.description: Calculated as the product of the asset's circulating supply and its current price quoted in USD (we sometimes apply a MKT_CAP_PENALTY depending on liquidity conditions). This is used to rank assets in toplists based on their circulating market capitalization.

TOTAL_MKT_CAP_USD.description: Calculated as the product of the asset's total supply and its current price quoted in USD (we sometimes apply a MKT_CAP_PENALTY depending on liquidity conditions). This figure gives an overview of the total value of all issued tokens for a given asset.

CIRCULATING_MKT_CAP_CONVERSION.description: Calculated as the product of the asset's circulating supply and its current price quoted in conversion asset (we sometimes apply a MKT_CAP_PENALTY depending on liquidity conditions). We calculate this field by multiplying the CIRCULATING_MKT_CAP_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE.

TOTAL_MKT_CAP_CONVERSION.description: Calculated as the product of the asset's total supply and its current price quoted in conversion asset (we sometimes apply a MKT_CAP_PENALTY depending on liquidity conditions). We calculate this field by multiplying the TOTAL_MKT_CAP_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIE.description: Aggregated 24 hours volume of the asset traded accross instruments that are quoted in USD on spot markets that we consider top tier, quoted in USD. Provides insights into the USD liquidity and trading activity of the asset on top tier spot markets.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_DIRECT_.description: Aggregated 24 hours volume of the asset traded accross instruments that are quoted in USD on all the intergarted spot markets, quoted in USD. Provides insights into the USD liquidity and trading activity of the asset.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIE.description: Aggregated 24 hours volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on spot markets that we consider top tier, quoted in USD. This is the sum of all the trade volumes on all the spot top tier markets, every trade volume is converted to USD using the most accurate conversion price at the time of the trade. These markets meet specific quality criteria, offering a more curated view of trading activity.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD.description: Aggregated 24 hours volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on all the integrated spot markets, quoted in USD. This is the sum of all the trade volumes on all the spot markets, every trade volume is converted to USD using the most accurate conversion price at the time of the trade. Useful for understanding demand and trading interest.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIE.description: Aggregated 24 hours volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on spot markets that we consider top tier, quoted in conversion asset. We calculate this field by multiplying the SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_CONVERS.description: Aggregated 24 hours volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on all the integrated spot markets. We calculate this field by multiplying the SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_USD.description: The difference between the value of the asset quoted in USD 24 hours ago and the latest USD price.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_US.description: The percentage difference between the value of the asset quoted in USD 24 hours ago and the latest USD price.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_CONVERSION.description: The approximate difference between the value of the asset quoted conversion currency 23 hours ago and now. We calculate this field by multiplying the SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE. This figure does not take into account the volatility of the conversion asset quoted in USD.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_CO.description: The percentage difference between the value of the asset quoted in USD 24 hours ago and the latest USD price. This is the same as the SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD just adding it here for easier access.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_.description: Aggregated 7 days volume of the asset traded accross instruments that are quoted in USD on spot markets that we consider top tier, quoted in USD. Provides insights into the USD liquidity and trading activity of the asset on top tier spot markets.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_DIRECT_US.description: Aggregated 7 days volume of the asset traded accross instruments that are quoted in USD on all the intergarted spot markets, quoted in USD. Provides insights into the USD liquidity and trading activity of the asset.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_.description: Aggregated 7 days volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on spot markets that we consider top tier, quoted in USD. This is the sum of all the trade volumes on all the spot top tier markets, every trade volume is converted to USD using the most accurate conversion price at the time of the trade. These markets meet specific quality criteria, offering a more curated view of trading activity.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD.description: Aggregated 7 days volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on all the integrated spot markets, quoted in USD. This is the sum of all the trade volumes on all the spot markets, every trade volume is converted to USD using the most accurate conversion price at the time of the trade. Useful for understanding demand and trading interest.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_.description: Aggregated 7 days volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on spot markets that we consider top tier, quoted in conversion asset. We calculate this field by multiplying the SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_CONVERSIO.description: Aggregated 7 days volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on all the integrated spot markets. We calculate this field by multiplying the SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_USD.description: The difference between the value of the asset quoted in USD 7 days ago and the latest USD price.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD.description: The percentage difference between the value of the asset quoted in USD 7 days ago and the latest USD price.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_CONVERSION.description: The approximate difference between the value of the asset quoted conversion currency 6 days ago and current day. We calculate this field by multiplying the SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE. This figure does not take into account the volatility of the conversion asset quoted in USD.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_CONV.description: The percentage difference between the value of the asset quoted in USD 7 days ago and the latest USD price. This is the same as the SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD just adding it here for easier access.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER.description: Aggregated 30 days volume of the asset traded accross instruments that are quoted in USD on spot markets that we consider top tier, quoted in USD. Provides insights into the USD liquidity and trading activity of the asset on top tier spot markets.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_DIRECT_U.description: Aggregated 30 days volume of the asset traded accross instruments that are quoted in USD on all the intergarted spot markets, quoted in USD. Provides insights into the USD liquidity and trading activity of the asset.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER.description: Aggregated 30 days volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on spot markets that we consider top tier, quoted in USD. This is the sum of all the trade volumes on all the spot top tier markets, every trade volume is converted to USD using the most accurate conversion price at the time of the trade. These markets meet specific quality criteria, offering a more curated view of trading activity.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD.description: Aggregated 30 days volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on all the integrated spot markets, quoted in USD. This is the sum of all the trade volumes on all the spot markets, every trade volume is converted to USD using the most accurate conversion price at the time of the trade. Useful for understanding demand and trading interest.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER.description: Aggregated 30 days volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on spot markets that we consider top tier, quoted in conversion asset. We calculate this field by multiplying the SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_CONVERSI.description: Aggregated 30 days volume of the asset traded accross all instruments on all the integrated spot markets. We calculate this field by multiplying the SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_USD.description: The difference between the value of the asset quoted in USD 30 days ago and the latest USD price.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD.description: The percentage difference between the value of the asset quoted in USD 30 days ago and the latest USD price.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_CONVERSION.description: The approximate difference between the value of the asset quoted conversion currency 29 days ago and current day. We calculate this field by multiplying the SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_USD and the PRICE_CONVERSION_VALUE. This figure does not take into account the volatility of the conversion asset quoted in USD.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_CON.description: The percentage difference between the value of the asset quoted in USD 30 days ago and the latest USD price. This is the same as the SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD just adding it here for easier access.

TOPLIST_BASE_RANK.description: Indicates the assetâ€™s position in our global asset ranking. There are multiple ranks, each is determined by at least one factor, such as asset launch date, market cap, trading volume, etc..

CREATED_ON.description: Rank based on CREATED_ON sorted ASC from earliest created to most recent one.

LAUNCH_DATE.description: Rank based on LAUNCH_DATE sorted ASC from earliest launched to most recently launched one.

PRICE_USD.description: Rank based on PRICE_USD sorted DESC from most expensive asset to cheapest one.

CIRCULATING_MKT_CAP_USD.description: Rank based on CIRCULATING_MKT_CAP_USD sorted DESC from highest circulating market cap to lowest.

TOTAL_MKT_CAP_USD.description: Rank based on TOTAL_MKT_CAP_USD sorted DESC from highest total market cap to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIE.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_DIRECT_USD sorted DESC from highest quote volume accross top tier markets that trade directly to USD to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_DIRECT_.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_DIRECT_USD sorted DESC from highest volume accross all markets that trade directly to USD to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIE.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_USD sorted DESC from highest quote volume accross top tier markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD sorted DESC from highest quote volume accross all markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_USD.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_USD sorted DESC from highest change accross all markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_US.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_24_HOUR_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD sorted DESC from highest percentage change accross all markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_DIRECT_USD sorted DESC from highest quote volume accross top tier markets that trade directly to USD to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_DIRECT_US.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_DIRECT_USD sorted DESC from highest volume accross all markets that trade directly to USD to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_USD sorted DESC from highest quote volume accross top tier markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD sorted DESC from highest quote volume accross all markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_USD.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_USD sorted DESC from highest change accross all markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_7_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD sorted DESC from highest percentage change accross all markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_DIRECT_USD sorted DESC from highest quote volume accross top tier markets that trade directly to USD to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_DIRECT_U.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_DIRECT_USD sorted DESC from highest volume accross all markets that trade directly to USD to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_TOP_TIER_USD sorted DESC from highest quote volume accross top tier markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_QUOTE_VOLUME_USD sorted DESC from highest quote volume accross all markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_USD.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_USD sorted DESC from highest change accross all markets to lowest.

SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD.description: Rank based on SPOT_MOVING_30_DAY_CHANGE_PERCENTAGE_USD sorted DESC from highest percentage change accross all markets to lowest.

TOTAL_ENDPOINTS_OK.description: Total endpoints we have successfully called in the last 24 hours.

TOTAL_ENDPOINTS_WITH_ISSUES.description: Total endpoints that have not had a successfull call in the last 24 hours.

LIST.description: The list of search result assets dynamically ranked based on the presence and type of search_string provided, prioritizing exact ID matches, then exact and partial symbol matches with consideration for market cap, followed by name matches and broad matches, finally defaulting to top assets by market cap in the absence of a query.

TYPE.description: Identifies the category or type of data represented, crucial for understanding the context of the asset. We use it to define what fields follow after this.

ID.description: Unique numerical identifier assigned to each asset, serving as a primary key for database reference.

SYMBOL.description: The abbreviated representation or ticker symbol of the asset, commonly used in markets and trading.

URI.description: Web address or endpoint where detailed information about the asset can be found.

IS_PUBLIC.description: Boolean indicator specifying whether the asset is visible and accessible to the public in the API.

NAME.description: Full name of the asset, providing a clear and descriptive identification beyond its symbol.

LOGO_URL.description: URL to the official logo image for the asset, used for visual identification in interfaces.

ASSET_TYPE.description: Describes the category of the asset (e.g., BLOCKCHAIN, TOKEN, FIAT, etc.), aiding in classification and filtering.

HAS_SMART_CONTRACT_CAPABILITIES.description: Indicates whether the asset supports or is capable of executing smart contracts, important for understanding functional capabilities.

MARKET_NAME.description: For BLOCKCHAIN and TOKEN assets it is the CoinDesk data board market reference rate - cadli. For INDEX assets it is the specific market name where the index is traded or published.

CIRCULATING_MKT_CAP_USD.description: Represents the current market capitalization based on circulating supply and price, important for economic and financial analysis. Calculated as the product of the asset's circulating supply and its current price in USD (we sometimes apply a MKT_CAP_PENALTY depending on liquidity conditions). This is used to rank assets in the search results based on their circulating market capitalization.

ID_PARENT_ASSET.description: The ID of any parent asset, linking related assets and enabling hierarchical data structuring. Null if the asset does not have a parent. An example of parent asset would be the fiat USD for the stablecoin USDC or USDT.

PARENT_ASSET_SYMBOL.description: Symbol of the parent asset, if applicable, helping to identify and relate assets within a family or series. Null if the asset does not have a parent. An example of parent asset would be the fiat USD for the stablecoin USDC or USDT.

ROOT_ASSET_ID.description: Identifies the root asset in a chain of derived or related assets, essential for tracing asset lineage. Null if the asset does not have a parent. For example, the fiat USD (id: 5) would be the root asset for the tokens CUSDC (id: 1623) or USDCE (id: 1728).

ROOT_ASSET_SYMBOL.description: The symbol of the root asset, facilitating recognition and correlation within asset hierarchies. Null if the asset does not have a parent. For example, the fiat USD (id: 5) would be the root asset for the tokens CUSDC (id: 1623) or USDCE (id: 1728).

ROOT_ASSET_TYPE.description: Specifies the fundamental category of the root asset, crucial for understanding the base or origin of an asset's classification. Null if the asset does not have a parent. For example, the fiat USD would be the root asset for tokens CUSDC or USDCE, and in this case, the ROOT_ASSET_TYPE would be fiat.

CREATED_ON.description: The Unix timestamp of the asset entry creation in our system.

STATS.description: The statistics of the current page.

PAGE_SIZE.description: The current number of items on this page.

TOTAL_ASSETS.description: The total number of assets available.

LIST.description: The list of summary asset data.

TYPE.description: Specifies the type or category of the message or data being handled. This is a unique number / id for each message type.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the asset entry

SYMBOL.description: Internal mapped symbol for a specific asset

URI.description: The uri path that this asset will be found on / url-slug

NAME.description: The full name of the asset, e.g. Bitcoin.

LOGO_URL.description: The image that appears when you see this asset.

LAUNCH_DATE.description: The launch date of the asset is indicated as (yyyy-mm-dd). However, if the asset was initially established as a token before being integrated into a blockchain, the launch date is reset to the creation of the first block when the blockchain is launched for the token.

Err.description: This object provides detailed information about an error encountered while processing the request. It includes an error code, a message explaining the error, and additional context about the parameters or values that caused the issue. This helps clients identify and resolve issues with their requests.

type.description: A public facing error type. If you want to treat a specific error use the type.

message.example: Not found: market parameter. Value test_market_does_not_exist not integrated yet. We list all markets in lowercase and transform the parameter sent, make sure you check the https://data-api.cryptocompare.com/spot/v1/markets endpoint for a list of all the supported TRADE_SPOT markets

param.description: The parameter that is responsible for the error

values.description: The values responsible for the error

ID.description: The unique identifier for the asset event entry

ASSET_ID.description: The unique identifier for the asset the event entry is associated to.

EVENT_TYPE.description: The event type, one of the following: SECURITY-INCIDENT, HARD-FORK, SOFT-FORK, TICKER-CHANGE, MIGRATION, SUPPLY-BURN, SUPPLY-LOCK, SPLIT, REVERSE-SPLIT, TOKEN-LISTING, TOKEN-DELISTING, NETWORK-CONTROL-CHANGE, OTHER

ANNOUNCED_ON.description: The unix timestamp when we were notified of the event

IMPLEMENTATION_START_DATE.description: The unix timestamp when the event was triggered

IMPLEMENTATION_END_DATE.description: The unix timestamp when the event finished

NAME.description: Name text

DESCRIPTION.description: Description text
DESCRIPTION.example: South Korean crypto exchange GDAC suffered a hack on April 9, 2023, in which 61 Bitcoins and other crypto assets were stolen, amounting to a total loss of around USD 13 million. This represented about 13% of GDAC's total asset holdings. The hack occurred on the GDAC hot wallet that stored various crypto assets, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, WEMIX tokens, and Tether.

SPLIT_FACTOR.description: Represents the multiplier in a regular split. For instance, in a 2-for-1 split, the split factor would be 2.

SPLIT_RATIO.description: Represents the divisor in a reverse split. For instance, in a 1-for-5 reverse split, the split ratio would be 5.

EXCHANGE_NAME.description: The name of the exchange where the token is listed.

PAIRS.description: The trading pairs of the token listed on the exchange (e.g., ["BTC/USD", "ETH/USD"]).

COMMENT.description: The internal comments added to this event by our team

CREATED_ON.description: Asset Event internal creation unix ts in our system

CREATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who created the asset event

CREATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who created the asset event at the time of the asset event creation (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

UPDATED_ON.description: Asset Event internal last updated unix ts in our system

UPDATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who last updated the asset event

UPDATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who last updated the internal information of the asset event at the time of the asset event update (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

UNIT.description: The unit of the historical period update: HOUR for hour and DAY for day.

ASSET_ID.description: The unique identifier for the asset

ASSET_SYMBOL.description: Internal mapped symbol for a specific asset

TIMESTAMP.description: The timestamp in seconds of the histo period, for hour it would be start of the hour and for daily it is 00:00 GMT/UTC

TOTAL_CONTRIBUTORS.description: The total number of contributors across all code repositories associated with this asset. A contributor is a users who has contributed to a project by making changes or improvements to the project's codebase, having their changes accepted and merged, and is acknowledged for their contributions in the project's development history.

TOTAL_FORKS.description: The total number of forks across all code repositories associated with this asset. A fork in GitHub is a feature that allows users to create a personal copy of another repository, enabling them to modify, experiment with, or contribute to the project without affecting the original work.

TOTAL_STARS.description: The total number of stars received across all code repositories associated with this asset. A star is when a GitHub user bookmarks or wants to show appreciation for a particular repository, much like a "like" or "favorite" function on other social media platforms.

TOTAL_SUBSCRIBERS.description: The total number of subscribers across all code repositories associated with this asset. A subscriber is a user who has chosen to receive notifications for updates or changes made to a specific repository, allowing them to closely follow the development and discussions of a project.

TOTAL_OPEN_ISSUES.description: The total number of open issues across all code repositories associated with this asset. An open issue is a reported problem, suggestion, or task related to a repository that has not been resolved or closed yet, providing a platform for users to track and discuss the ongoing development and improvements of a project.

TOTAL_CLOSED_ISSUES.description: The total number of closed issues across all code repositories associated with this asset. A closed issue is a reported problem, suggestion, or task related to a repository that have been resolved or deemed no longer relevant, providing a record of past challenges and solutions within the project development.

TOTAL_OPEN_PULL_REQUESTS.description: The total number of open pull requests across all code repositories associated with this asset.An open pull request on GitHub is a proposed change to a repository's codebase that is open for review and discussion, offering contributors an opportunity to improve the project and maintainers to accept, reject, or request changes before integrating the proposed modifications.

TOTAL_CLOSED_PULL_REQUESTS.description: The total number of closed pull requests across all code repositories associated with this asset. A closed pull request is a proposed change to a repository's codebase that has been either accepted and merged into the codebase, rejected by the maintainers, or withdrawn by the submitter, providing a record of changes that were suggested and their outcomes in the project's development history.

CODE_REPOSITORIES.description: An array with all the data for each code repository used to calculate the total stats.

URL.description: The URL of the code repository used to retrieve social metrics.

CONTRIBUTORS.description: The number of contributors to the code repository.

FORKS.description: The number of forks of the code repository.

STARS.description: The number of stars received by the code repository.

SUBSCRIBERS.description: The number of subscribers to the code repository.

OPEN_ISSUES.description: The number of open issues in the code repository.

CLOSED_ISSUES.description: The number of closed issues in the code repository.

OPEN_PULL_REQUESTS.description: The number of open pull requests in the code repository.

CLOSED_PULL_REQUESTS.description: The number of closed pull requests in the code repository.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the article entry

GUID.description: The Global Unique Identifier (GUID) of the article. A GUID is a unique reference number used as an identifier in computer systems. The "Article guid" is unique for every article and serves as its distinct identifier.

PUBLISHED_ON.description: The unix timestamp when the article was first published. This information is useful for understanding the timeline of the content, sorting articles by date, or determining the recency of the information.

PUBLISHED_ON_NS.description: The nanosecond part of the PUBLISHED_ON field.

IMAGE_URL.description: The URL, or web address, of the article's associated or featured image. This URL can be used to retrieve the image for display, providing a visual context for the article content. The URL points directly to the location where the image file is stored online.

TITLE.description: The heading or title of a specific article. It's a text string that gives a concise description of the article's content.

SUBTITLE.description: The subheading or subtitle of a specific article. It's a text string that gives additional context to the article's title.

AUTHORS.description: The author or authors of a specific article.

URL.description: The web address that directs to the specific content or article on a source website. It's a unique URL used for directly linking to the article or for fetching additional data from the article page.

SOURCE_ID.description: The unique identifier for the source of the article or content. The "SOURCE_ID" allows for easy tracking and categorization of articles based on their origin, facilitating analysis by source, or fetching additional content from the same source.

BODY.description: The main textual content of the article. It includes the substance of the article but it it generally very limited since sources want clients to visit their website. This is where the primary information of the article is found.

KEYWORDS.description: A list of words or phrases that are relevant to the content of the article. These keywords are given by the source and serve as a summary of the main themes, topics, or subjects covered in the article.

LANG.description: The article Preferred language - English (EN), Portuguese (PT), Espanol (ES), Turkish (TR), French (FR)

UPVOTES.description: The number of upvotes this article has.

DOWNVOTES.description: The number of downvotes this article has.

SENTIMENT.description: The sentiment polarity of this article. We compute this using ChatGPT.

STATUS.description: The status for the Article. Allowed values: ACTIVE, DELETED

CREATED_ON.description: Article internal creation unix ts in our system

CREATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who created the article

CREATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who created the article at the time of the article creation (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

UPDATED_ON.description: Article internal last updated unix ts in our system

UPDATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who last updated the article

UPDATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who last updated the internal information of the article at the time of the article update (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

SOURCE_DATA.description: The news source data of this article.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the news source entry

SOURCE_KEY.description: The unique key for a news source

NAME.description: The name of the news source

IMAGE_URL.description: The image url for the article source

URL.description: The URL of the news source.

LANG.description: The Article Source Preferred language - English (EN), Portuguese (PT), Espanol (ES), Turkish (TR), French (FR)

LAUNCH_DATE.description: The launch date of the source is indicated as (yyyy-mm-dd).

SORT_ORDER.description: Internal sort order of the source to define the field overwrites

CALL_TIMEOUT.description: The milliseconds before a network call timeout for a news source

SKIP_ARTICLE_IMAGE.description: Skip uploading images from this news source articles. Defaults to news source cover image.

STATUS.description: The status for the Article Source entry. Allowed values: ACTIVE, INACTIVE

LAST_UPDATED_TS.description: The last script update timestamp for this article source.

LAST_ARTICLE_PUBLISHED_AT.description: The timestamp for when the last article was published.

LAST_CALL.description: The last call timestamp for this source.

LAST_CALL_SUCCESS.description: The timestamp for when the last call was successful.

CREATED_ON.description: Article Source internal creation unix ts in our system

CREATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who created the news source

CREATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who created the news source at the time of the news source creation (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

UPDATED_ON.description: Article Source internal last updated unix ts in our system

UPDATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who last updated the news source

UPDATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who last updated the internal information of the news source at the time of the news source update (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

CATEGORY_DATA.description: An array of categories this article belongs to.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the news category entry

NAME.description: The name of the news category

ID.description: The unique identifier for the news source entry

SOURCE_KEY.description: The unique key for a news source

NAME.description: The name of the news source

IMAGE_URL.description: The image url for the article source

URL.description: The URL of the news source.

LANG.description: The Article Source Preferred language - English (EN), Portuguese (PT), Espanol (ES), Turkish (TR), French (FR)

LAUNCH_DATE.description: The launch date of the source is indicated as (yyyy-mm-dd).

SORT_ORDER.description: Internal sort order of the source to define the field overwrites

CALL_TIMEOUT.description: The milliseconds before a network call timeout for a news source

SKIP_ARTICLE_IMAGE.description: Skip uploading images from this news source articles. Defaults to news source cover image.

STATUS.description: The status for the Article Source entry. Allowed values: ACTIVE, INACTIVE

LAST_UPDATED_TS.description: The last script update timestamp for this article source.

LAST_ARTICLE_PUBLISHED_AT.description: The timestamp for when the last article was published.

LAST_CALL.description: The last call timestamp for this source.

LAST_CALL_SUCCESS.description: The timestamp for when the last call was successful.

CREATED_ON.description: Article Source internal creation unix ts in our system

CREATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who created the news source

CREATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who created the news source at the time of the news source creation (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

UPDATED_ON.description: Article Source internal last updated unix ts in our system

UPDATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who last updated the news source

UPDATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who last updated the internal information of the news source at the time of the news source update (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

ID.description: The unique identifier for the news category entry

NAME.description: The name of the news category

JSON_TEXT_FILTER.description: The filters for the news category.

INCLUDED_WORDS.description: Words related or included in news category

EXCLUDED_PHRASES.description: phrases to should be excluded from news category

INCLUDED_PHRASES.description: phrases that should be included in news category

STATUS.description: The status for the News category entry. Allowed values: ACTIVE, INACTIVE

CREATED_ON.description: News category internal creation unix ts in our system

CREATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who created the news category

CREATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who created the news category at the time of the news category creation (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

UPDATED_ON.description: News category internal last updated unix ts in our system

UPDATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who last updated the news category

UPDATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who last updated the internal information of the news category at the time of the news category update (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

ID.description: The unique identifier for the article entry

GUID.description: The Global Unique Identifier (GUID) of the article. A GUID is a unique reference number used as an identifier in computer systems. The "Article guid" is unique for every article and serves as its distinct identifier.

PUBLISHED_ON.description: The unix timestamp when the article was first published. This information is useful for understanding the timeline of the content, sorting articles by date, or determining the recency of the information.

PUBLISHED_ON_NS.description: The nanosecond part of the PUBLISHED_ON field.

IMAGE_URL.description: The URL, or web address, of the article's associated or featured image. This URL can be used to retrieve the image for display, providing a visual context for the article content. The URL points directly to the location where the image file is stored online.

TITLE.description: The heading or title of a specific article. It's a text string that gives a concise description of the article's content.

SUBTITLE.description: The subheading or subtitle of a specific article. It's a text string that gives additional context to the article's title.

AUTHORS.description: The author or authors of a specific article.

URL.description: The web address that directs to the specific content or article on a source website. It's a unique URL used for directly linking to the article or for fetching additional data from the article page.

SOURCE_ID.description: The unique identifier for the source of the article or content. The "SOURCE_ID" allows for easy tracking and categorization of articles based on their origin, facilitating analysis by source, or fetching additional content from the same source.

BODY.description: The main textual content of the article. It includes the substance of the article but it it generally very limited since sources want clients to visit their website. This is where the primary information of the article is found.

KEYWORDS.description: A list of words or phrases that are relevant to the content of the article. These keywords are given by the source and serve as a summary of the main themes, topics, or subjects covered in the article.

LANG.description: The article Preferred language - English (EN), Portuguese (PT), Espanol (ES), Turkish (TR), French (FR)

UPVOTES.description: The number of upvotes this article has.

DOWNVOTES.description: The number of downvotes this article has.

SENTIMENT.description: The sentiment polarity of this article. We compute this using ChatGPT.

STATUS.description: The status for the Article. Allowed values: ACTIVE, DELETED

CREATED_ON.description: Article internal creation unix ts in our system

CREATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who created the article

CREATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who created the article at the time of the article creation (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

UPDATED_ON.description: Article internal last updated unix ts in our system

UPDATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who last updated the article

UPDATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who last updated the internal information of the article at the time of the article update (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

SOURCE_DATA.description: The news source data of this article.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the news source entry

SOURCE_KEY.description: The unique key for a news source

NAME.description: The name of the news source

IMAGE_URL.description: The image url for the article source

URL.description: The URL of the news source.

LANG.description: The Article Source Preferred language - English (EN), Portuguese (PT), Espanol (ES), Turkish (TR), French (FR)

LAUNCH_DATE.description: The launch date of the source is indicated as (yyyy-mm-dd).

SORT_ORDER.description: Internal sort order of the source to define the field overwrites

CALL_TIMEOUT.description: The milliseconds before a network call timeout for a news source

SKIP_ARTICLE_IMAGE.description: Skip uploading images from this news source articles. Defaults to news source cover image.

STATUS.description: The status for the Article Source entry. Allowed values: ACTIVE, INACTIVE

LAST_UPDATED_TS.description: The last script update timestamp for this article source.

LAST_ARTICLE_PUBLISHED_AT.description: The timestamp for when the last article was published.

LAST_CALL.description: The last call timestamp for this source.

LAST_CALL_SUCCESS.description: The timestamp for when the last call was successful.

CREATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who created the news source

CREATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who created the news source at the time of the news source creation (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

UPDATED_BY.description: Internal user id of the user who last updated the news source

UPDATED_BY_USERNAME.description: Internal username of the user who last updated the internal information of the news source at the time of the news source update (the user might have changed their username but not their user id)

CATEGORY_DATA.description: An array of categories this article belongs to.

ID.description: The unique identifier for the news category entry

NAME.description: The name of the news category

TYPE.description: Type of the message, this is 884 for overall market cap and volume type messages.

CCSEQ.description: Our internal sequence number for this tick update, this is unique per total mkt cap update. It will be increasing by 1 for each new tick update we send.

VALUE.description: The sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria at the VALUE_LAST_UPDATE_TS timestamp.

VALUE_FLAG.description: The flag indicating if the value has increased (UP), decreased (DOWN), or not changed (UNCHANGED).

VALUE_LAST_UPDATE_TS.description: The timestamp in seconds when this value was calculated.

CURRENT_HOUR_OPEN.description: The sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria closest to the start of the current hour.

CURRENT_HOUR_HIGH.description: The highest sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the current hour.

CURRENT_HOUR_LOW.description: The lowest sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the current hour.

CURRENT_HOUR_TOP_TIER_VOLUME.description: The sum of assets top-tier volumes (top-tier volume * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria in the current hour.

CURRENT_DAY_OPEN.description: The sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria closest to the start of the current day (00:00:00 GMT/UTC).

CURRENT_DAY_HIGH.description: The highest sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the current day (00:00:00 GMT/UTC).

CURRENT_DAY_LOW.description: The lowest sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the current day (00:00:00 GMT/UTC).

CURRENT_DAY_TOP_TIER_VOLUME.description: The sum of assets top-tier volumes (top-tier volume * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria in the current day (00:00:00 GMT/UTC).

MOVING_24_HOUR_OPEN.description: The sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria closest to the start of the 24 hours period (23 hours + current hour).

MOVING_24_HOUR_HIGH.description: The highest sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the 24 hours period (23 hours + current hour).

MOVING_24_HOUR_LOW.description: The lowest sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the 24 hours period (23 hours + current hour).

MOVING_24_HOUR_TOP_TIER_VOLUME.description: The sum of assets top-tier volumes (top-tier volume * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the 24 hours period (23 hours + current hour).

UNIT.description: The unit of the message.

TIMESTAMP.description: The timestamp in seconds of the beginning of the histo period. For minute it would be every minute at the beginning of the minute, for hour it would be the start of the hour and for daily it is 00:00 GMT.

TYPE.description: Type of the message, this is 886 .

OPEN.description: The sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria closest to the start of the time period.

HIGH.description: The highest sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the time period.

LOW.description: The lowest sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the time period.

CLOSE.description: The sum of assets circulating mkt caps (circulating supply * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria closest to the end of the time period.

TOP_TIER_VOLUME.description: The sum of assets top-tier volumes (top-tier volume * price quoted in USD) that meet the inclusion criteria during the time period.

API_KEY.description: Contains the rate limit information for the API key, including the number of API calls used, the maximum allowed, and the remaining calls available across different time periods (SECOND, MINUTE, HOUR, DAY, MONTH). This field allows you to monitor how close you are to your API key's rate limit and take appropriate action to avoid being rate-limited. The SOFT_CAP_ALLOWANCE_MULTIPLIER may be included to indicate the overage allowed beyond the maximum limit before rate-limiting is enforced.

TYPE.description: Defines the split type of the rate limit usage data.

USED.description: Represents the API calls already used, split by the time periods defined in the periods fields (second, minute, hour, day, month).

TYPE.description: Type of the rate limit data (used, max, or remaining).

SECOND.description: The total API calls used, max allowed, or remaining within the current second.

MINUTE.description: The total API calls used, max allowed, or remaining within the current minute.

HOUR.description: The total API calls used, max allowed, or remaining within the current hour.

DAY.description: The total API calls used, max allowed, or remaining within the current day.

MONTH.description: The total API calls used, max allowed, or remaining within the current month.

MAX.description: Represents the maximum number of API calls allowed, split by the time periods defined in the periods fields (second, minute, hour, day, month), with an allowance multiplier for overage.

TYPE.description: Type of the rate limit data (used, max, or remaining).

SECOND.description: The total API calls used, max allowed, or remaining within the current second.

HOUR.description: The total API calls used, max allowed, or remaining within the current hour.

DAY.description: The total API calls used, max allowed, or remaining within the current day.

MONTH.description: The total API calls used, max allowed, or remaining within the current month.

SOFT_CAP_ALLOWANCE_MULTIPLIER.description: A multiplier that allows API requests to exceed the maximum rate limit by a percentage before being rate-limited. For example, a value of 1.2 allows for a 20% overage before enforcement.

REMAINING.description: Represents the number of API calls remaining before hitting the rate limit, split by the time periods defined in the periods fields (second, minute, hour, day, month).

AUTH_KEY.description: Contains the rate limit information for the AUTH_KEY, including the number of API calls used, the maximum allowed, and the remaining calls available across different time periods (SECOND, MINUTE, HOUR, DAY, MONTH). The AUTH_KEY is used when accessing the documentation page or utilizing services on the CryptoCompare or CCData websites.

RATE_LIMIT_RESPONSE_DATA.description: The response object contains the current rate limit usage data for both API_KEY and AUTH_KEY. This includes the number of API calls USED, the MAX allowed calls, and the REMAINING calls before reaching the limit. The data is provided across various time periods (SECOND, MINUTE, HOUR, DAY, MONTH). Additionally, a SOFT_CAP_ALLOWANCE_MULTIPLIER may be present to indicate how much over the maximum allowed calls the client can go before being rate-limited.

VERSION.description: The version of the API consists of three parts: the first number (2) represents the main version tied to the base URL, which only changes if the base URL changes, ensuring no breaking changes occur without a URL update. The second number (1) indicates breaking changes to the format while keeping the same URL; however, this number should never really change. If a breaking change is needed, it would be announced at least 6 months in advance, though due to our deprecation policy and individual endpoint versioning, this scenario should rarely, if ever, occur. The last number (21356) is our internal package version, incremented with each system deployment, primarily for internal tracking, and will always increase, though it may have gaps.

API_VERSION_DATA.description: The current API version. It helps clients to be aware of any API updates or changes.
